title: Installation issue: mxnet python runtime error
body:
### Description

Mxnet now builds fine, but there is a runtime error. It happens on both x86_64 and ppc64le.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

Make sure that nvidia drivers are installed (outside of spack), this is needed at runtime.

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install -j64 mxnet +cuda cuda_arch=60 -opencv ^cuda@10.1.243 ^cudnn@7.6.5.32-10.1 ^openblas@0.3.12 ^python@3.7.0:3.7.999
(should work)
$ spack load mxnet
$ python3 -c "import mxnet; print('Num GPUs Available:', mxnet.context.num_gpus())"
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/grid5000/spack/opt/spack/linux-debian10-x86_64/gcc-8.3.0/mxnet-1.6.0-qjv4wocfd4jns7e5mbjtem3tga3spsgb/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mxnet/__init__.py", line 24, in <module>
    from .context import Context, current_context, cpu, gpu, cpu_pinned
  File "/grid5000/spack/opt/spack/linux-debian10-x86_64/gcc-8.3.0/mxnet-1.6.0-qjv4wocfd4jns7e5mbjtem3tga3spsgb/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mxnet/context.py", line 24, in <module>
    from .base import classproperty, with_metaclass, _MXClassPropertyMetaClass
  File "/grid5000/spack/opt/spack/linux-debian10-x86_64/gcc-8.3.0/mxnet-1.6.0-qjv4wocfd4jns7e5mbjtem3tga3spsgb/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mxnet/base.py", line 214, in <module>
    _LIB = _load_lib()
  File "/grid5000/spack/opt/spack/linux-debian10-x86_64/gcc-8.3.0/mxnet-1.6.0-qjv4wocfd4jns7e5mbjtem3tga3spsgb/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mxnet/base.py", line 205, in _load_lib
    lib = ctypes.CDLL(lib_path[0], ctypes.RTLD_LOCAL)
  File "/grid5000/spack/opt/spack/linux-debian10-x86_64/gcc-8.3.0/python-3.7.9-c3a4tza6pxa35dfx5tinqxurisfyuxxa/lib/python3.7/ctypes/__init__.py", line 364, in __init__
    self._handle = _dlopen(self._name, mode)
OSError: /grid5000/spack/opt/spack/linux-debian10-x86_64/gcc-8.3.0/mxnet-1.6.0-qjv4wocfd4jns7e5mbjtem3tga3spsgb/lib/libmxnet.so: undefined symbol: _ZN5mxnet2op16ElemwiseBinaryOp11DnsCsrCsrOpIN7mshadow3gpuENS0_10mshadow_op3mulEEEvRKN4nnvm9NodeAttrsERKNS_9OpContextERKNS_7NDArrayESG_NS_9OpReqTypeESG_b
$ which python3
/grid5000/spack/opt/spack/linux-debian10-x86_64/gcc-8.3.0/python-3.7.9-c3a4tza6pxa35dfx5tinqxurisfyuxxa/bin/python3
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-1006-cbdf87cd28
* **Python:** 3.7.9
* **Platform:** linux-debian10-skylake_avx512
* **Concretizer:** original
